entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 10.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
